metadata.title: CVE-2018-18249 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: Icinga Web 2 before 2.6.2 allows injection of PHP ini-file directives via vectors involving environment variables as the channel to send information to the attacker, such as a name=${PATH}_${APACHE_RUN_DIR}_${APACHE_RUN_USER} parameter to /icingaweb2/navigation/add or /icingaweb2/dashboard/new-dashlet.

criterions.comment: icingaweb2 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
